introduction: We are a 360 marketing communications agency known for our passionate, speedy, and collaborative culture. With deep expertise in both local and international markets, we are the parent company to Pulse Post Production and Channel Production. Operating since 1990 in the MENA region, we offer comprehensive marketing solutions that meet the evolving needs of brands worldwide.

vision_and_mission.vision: To become the leading marketing communications agency in the MENA region and expand globally, offering innovative and high-quality services that resonate with audiences on a global scale.
vision_and_mission.mission: To deliver exceptional, tailored marketing solutions through creativity, technology, and an in-depth understanding of the market, ensuring that our clients' goals are met with precision and passion.

products_services.description: We create TV commercials, Out-of-Home (OOH) advertising, radio, and print media that captivate and engage audiences.
Activation campaigns, event management, and BTL productions designed to create impactful experiences for the target audience.
Social media management, content creation, and SEO strategies to boost online presence and engagement.
Strategic planning, copywriting, graphic design, and storyboarding that bring unique ideas to life.
Expert media relations, crisis management, and press events that protect and enhance brand reputation.
Brand identity development, corporate films, and product launches tailored to build and elevate a company's image.

achievements: Founded in 1990, with over 30 years of industry experience in the MENA region.
Parent company to Pulse Post Production, specializing in color grading, visual effects, and advanced graphics.
Parent company to Channel Production, handling projects from live-action commercials to high-end 3D animation.
Created campaigns for global brands like Coca-Cola, Uber, Vodafone, Samsung, Shell, and Nivea.
Recognized with several industry awards for creative excellence and innovation.
future_goals: We aim to expand into new international markets while continuing to offer innovative marketing solutions. Our goal is to remain at the forefront of the marketing industry, ensuring that every client receives unique, high-quality service tailored to their needs.
